title: Summarize New Legislation
description: A new law has been passed that affects a client's industry. An associate needs to summarize the law and its impact for the client.

tasks.description: Retrieve the full text of the new legislation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the text of the new law.

tasks.description: Read the legislation and identify the key provisions that will impact the client's business operations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent extracts the most relevant sections.

tasks.description: Draft a client alert memo that summarizes the new law in plain English and provides actionable advice on what the client needs to do to comply.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a helpful and informative client alert.
